title: The Story of My Life
intro: A life filled with passion and a portfolio with purpose
bio: This is the story of how I got into web development and what drives me behind the keyboard. I've always had a passion for technology and creative work, and this section gives you an insight into my journey and what I am passionate about. My journey began with a fascination for computers and creative work, which led me to studies in web design and graphic design. After working in print technology for many years, I realized that my true passion lay in web programming. I deepened my knowledge in .NET development at EC Education in Helsingborg, where I gained a solid foundation for creating innovative and functional web solutions. My portfolio is a reflection of this journey, filled with projects that showcase both my technical skills and creative abilities.
